answerText: George Bernard Shaw[10] Among Shaw's "Plays Unpleasant" is this work, in which Vivie discovers that her mother is a brothel owner.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 10 | 19 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man wrote a comical play full of mistaken identities in which the waiter Walter repeats the title phrase, You Can Never Tell. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author, who referred to his works You Can Never Tell, The Man of Destiny, Candida and Arms and the Man as his "Plays Pleasant."
